page.title: 10Wivelsfield - Events
page.content:
{The Country Fair}is held in June of each year on the village green. It was started in the mid 1970's to raise some of the money needed to build the village hall.
The school,clubs and other groups all participate to have fun and to raise funds for the upkeep of the hall.
There are a variety of side-shows, fancy dress competitions, arena events, a Punch and Judy show, refreshments, a dog show, pony rides and a flower show.There are also demonstrations of arts and crafts with perhaps a chance to try them out.
There are also opportunities to buy local produce, plants and home-made cakes.
